meanings.definition: Not permeable to liquids or gases.
meanings.sent1: The nonporous surface of the plastic bottle prevented any water from leaking out.
meanings.sent2: The glass jar is nonporous, so it keeps the contents fresh for a longer time.
meanings.sent3: The nonporous umbrella was so effective that not even a single raindrop could seep through.
meanings.sent4: Her nonporous determination to succeed was like a shield against any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The nonporous barrier between the two rooms made it impossible to hear any noise from the other side.

meanings.sent1: The nonporous raincoat kept her completely dry during the heavy downpour.
meanings.sent2: The plastic wrap is nonporous, ensuring that no air reaches the food inside.
meanings.sent3: His nonporous skin seemed to repel any lotion he tried to apply, making it a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The nonporous seal on the container locked in the freshness like a vault.
meanings.sent5: The nonporous walls of the fortress protected it from the harsh winds and rain outside.
